value.stringValue: Termination Request - Details can be found in Service Request Details section

formulas.name: varServiceRequest
formulas.expression: If(!ISNULL({!Address_1}) && !ISBLANK({!Address_1}), 'Address 1 - ' + {!Address_1} + {!newLine}, Null) +IF({!Address_2}!=NULL, " Address 2 (Apt or Unit#) - " +{!Address_2}+ {!newLine}, "") +If(!ISNULL({!City1}) && !ISBLANK({!City1}), 'City - ' + {!City1} + {!newLine}, Null) +If(!ISNULL({!State_Province}) && !ISBLANK({!State_Province}), 'State/Province - ' + {!State_Province} + {!newLine}, Null) +If(!ISNULL({!Zip_Postal_Code}) && !ISBLANK({!Zip_Postal_Code}), 'Zip/Postal Code - ' + {!Zip_Postal_Code} + {!newLine}, Null) +If(!ISNULL({!Country}) && !ISBLANK({!Country}), 'Country - ' + {!Country} + {!newLine}, Null) +if((NOT(ISNULL({!Country_Code_Canada.value})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Country_Code_Canada.value}))), "Country Code- " +{!Country_Code_Canada.value} + {!newLine} ,null) +If(NOT(ISNULL({!Update_Existing_Direct_Reports.recordName})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Update_Existing_Direct_Reports.recordName})), "Update Existing Direct Reports - " + {!Update_Existing_Direct_Reports.recordName} + {!newLine},null) +If({!Email_forwarding2}==TRUE,"Email forwarding - 90 days default" +{!newLine},null)+ If({!Phone_number_forwarding2}==TRUE,"Phone number forwarding - 90 days default " +{!newLine},null)+ If({!Phone_number_forwarding2}==TRUE,"Forward Phone number for 90 Days to "+{!VarUpdateExstiongPhone} +{!newLine},null)+ If({!Mailbox_delegation2}==TRUE,"Mailbox delegation - 90 days default " +{!newLine},null)+ If({!One_Drive_Access2}==TRUE,"One Drive Access - 90 days default " +{!newLine},null)+If(!ISNULL({!Additional_Information}) && !ISBLANK({!Additional_Information}), 'Additional Information - ' + {!Additional_Information} + {!newLine}, Null)

formulas.name: varServicerequest2
formulas.expression: if((NOT(ISNULL({!Region2})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Region2}))), "Region - " +{!Region2} + {!newLine} ,null)+ if((NOT(ISNULL({!Brand2})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Brand2}))), "Brand - " +{!Brand2} + {!newLine} ,null)+ If({!Requested_By2}!=null,{!Requested_By2}+"", " ")+{!varBreak}+ If({!Requested_for1}!=null,{!Requested_for1}+"", " ")+{!varBreak}+ If({!Show_Manager}!=null, {!Show_Manager}+"", " ")+{!varBreak}+ If({!Show_Job_Description}!=null, {!Show_Job_Description}+"", " ")+{!varBreak}+ If({!Show_Department}!=null,{!Show_Department}+"", " ")+{!varBreak}+ If ((NOT(ISNULL(TEXT({!Termination_Effective_Date_Time}))) && NOT(ISBLANK(TEXT({!Termination_Effective_Date_Time})))),"Termination Effective Date Time - " +TEXT({!Termination_Effective_Date_Time})+{!newLine} ,null)+ if((NOT(ISNULL({!Time_Zone2})) && NOT(ISBLANK({!Time_Zone2}))), "Time Zone - " +{!Time_Zone2} + {!newLine} ,null)+ IF({!Address_is_incorrect}==FALSE,{!varSpace}+ {!Display1}, "") + IF({!Address_is_incorrect}==TRUE, {!varSpace} +{!Correct_Address}, "") + IF({!Address_is_incorrect}==FALSE,{!varSpace}+ "Address 1  - " +{!Address_3}+ {!newLine}, "") + IF({!Address_is_incorrect}==FALSE, {!varSpace}+"City  - " +{!City2}+ {!newLine}, "") + IF({!Address_is_incorrect}==FALSE, {!varSpace}+"State/Province  - " +{!State_Province1}+ {!newLine}, "") + IF({!Address_is_incorrect}==FALSE, {!varSpace}+"Zip/Postal Code  - " +{!Zip_Postal_Code1}+ {!newLine}, "") + IF({!Address_is_incorrect}==FALSE,{!varSpace}+ "Country  - " +{!Country1}+ {!newLine}, "")
